Cell.Data: "Enneracts resurface every now and then. Those lucky enough to find them, not knowing any better, usually sell them on to be siphoned into energy crystals which fuel weapons or industry. Scholars have theorized that they may contain a small fragment of a divine entity's power, stored in an ancient but definitely manmade device. While mages may spend their life studying a few Enneracts to replicate their signature essence and cast spells, a select few are drawn to them and are able to absorb the energy within, making it theirs in an instant."

"从古至今，超维之石都有现世。那些运气足够好发现它们的人往往没有更好的处理方法，通常将之作为给用于工业或武器的魔晶充能的燃料变卖。 按照学者们的理论，它们可能包含着某个神圣存在的一枚力量碎片，曾被储存在一个古老但绝对是人造的装置之中。 当法师们穷尽一生去钻研一些超维之石的奥秘，以图复刻它们所象征的本质并施展对应的法术；被选中的一小部分人在命运的牵引下与它们相遇，他们能够吸收蕴含其中的能量，瞬间掌握相应的技能。"
Perform a basic attack with your equipped weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack.
用你装备的武器施展基础攻击。\n\n标签：普攻。
Punch your foes like your life depends on it!\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
就像职业拳手一样痛揍你的敌人！\n\n标签：普攻，近战。
A Republican Instructor once told you: "So you're good at throwing punches eh? Great. Now pick up a weapon or go home". Which was a little ironic, given that the military academy was your home.
一位共和国教官曾经跟你讲：“所以说你擅长拳击，嗯？很好，要么现在拿把武器，要么滚回家。这有点讽刺，因为军事学院就是你的家。
Perform a powerful Melee combo with your shield and equipped weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
用你的盾牌和装备的武器进行一次完美的近战连击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。
Slice, hack or smash foes with your main hand weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
用你的主手武器切割、肢解或粉碎敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。
Human creativity knows no bounds when it comes to inventing tools of slaughter. The only thing that matches that inspiration is their desire to do it in a stylish and effective way.
在发明屠宰工具方面，人类的创造力无与伦比。 唯一配得上这种创造力的就是人们试图用优雅而高效的方式做到这一点。
Unleash a flurry of blows with both of your weapons.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
用你的两种武器释放一连串的打击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Traditional fighters tend to consider the shield as the superior option. Clearly they have never fought the Screaming Furies of Laibon: a regiment of women dual wielding kopeshes while shouting fear away.
传统的斗士往往只把盾牌视为最佳选择。显然他们从来没有与莱邦的狂啸女斗士战斗过——那是一支由女性组成的军团，她们一边用吼叫驱赶恐惧一边挥舞着双手中的弯刀。
Swing your two handed sword to cleave your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
挥动你的双手剑来劈砍你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

At the military academy your strategy teacher rambled time and time again about the battle of Samatras. The Kuei Empire's light cavalry spotted a regiment of Republican footmen isolated from the rest of the battle. A swift sweep should have been enough to break the poor infantry... except they were greatsword wielders. That day, the Republican army had horsemeat for dinner.
在军事学院，你的战术老师在闲聊中时不时就会提到萨马特拉斯战役。库埃帝国的轻骑兵发现了一支落单的共和国步兵团。一次迅猛的冲锋就足以击溃这些可怜的步兵…除非他们用的是双手大剑。那一天，共和国的军队晚饭吃了马肉。
Maul your enemies with your two handed mace.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
用双手锤猛击你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

A jest only truly appreciated by battlehammer users: "Before a tournament, a knight spends two hours turtling behind three layers of thick fullplate armor. Scared of being late, he hurries in the arena and asks his unarmoured challenger "What time is it?" The lowborn picks up his maul and answers: "It's hammer time!".
这是一个只有铁锤使用者才真正欣赏的笑话：在比赛之前，一个骑士要花两个小时的让自己好缩在三层厚的全钢板装甲后面。由于害怕迟到，他匆匆赶到竞技场，询问他没穿铠甲的对手："现在是什么时间？"出身低微的挑战者拿起他的锤子回答："是打铁时间！"
Swing your two handed axe to cut down your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
挥动你的双手斧来砍倒你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。
Some see fighting as a dance, an art, a poetic display of murder. Meanwhile, others wield a big fat greataxe and chop people in half as casually as a butcher cuts meat. To each their own.
有些人认为战斗是一种舞蹈，一种艺术，一种对谋杀的诗意想象。同时，另外一些人挥舞着又粗又大的巨斧，像屠夫切肉一样随意地把人砍成两半。萝卜青菜，各有所爱。
Unleash a flurry of blows with two daggers.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
用两把匕首释放一连串的打击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Murderers, sociopaths and assassins all seem to share an unhealthy fetish for knives. Some researchers tried to understand this phenomenon. Their endeavour did not yield any conclusive results, given that half of them gave up after the first half got slaughtered, all with the same cause of death: multiple stabbings.
凶手，杀人犯，反社会人士和刺客似乎都对小刀有着病态的迷恋。 一些研究人员试图理解这种现象。 他们的努力没有产生任何确切的结论，因为他们中的一半在另一半的人被屠杀后放弃了，死者都有类似的死因：多次刺伤。
Fire at your foes with a crystal pistol.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
用魔晶手枪射击你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。
There's an old saying in the explorer's guild of Stormfall: "Do not bring a sword to a gunfight".
在暴风港的探险家公会中有一句老话："不要把剑带到枪战中"。
Fire at your foes with two crystal pistols.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
用两把魔晶手枪向敌人开火。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。

In the independent city of Archion there used to be an academy that taught sophisticated fighting techniques with two pistols. The training was so intense that people could be gone for years without being seen again. The world later learned that the academy had been shut down. Apparently the instructors were hiding the bodies of an absurd amount of students, dead to self-inflicted injuries.
在独立的城邦阿奇恩，曾经有一个学院传授用两把手枪战斗的复杂技巧。 训练强度高到参加训练的人很可能因此死亡，因为直到很多年后都没人再见过他们。世人后来才知道学院已被关停。 显然，导师们隐藏了数量大到荒谬的死于自残的学生尸体。
Execute a deadly barrage of blows and shots.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile, Melee.
进行一系列致命的打击和射击。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物，近战。

After several drinks of liquor, Captain James, a skypirate known for his infamous heist in the flying city of Archion, will often share his wisdom with the newbloods in his crew: "Alrigh' gather 'round ya silly skyvirgins! Everyone listen! Like oi always say, victory ain't 'bout the size of yar canons, nah it ain't, but its all 'bout...", and that's generally when he passes out.
詹姆斯船长，一个因在飞翔之城阿奇恩劫掠而凶名远扬的空中海盗，喝了几杯酒之后，就会和他的新手船员分享他的智慧："好嗝…你们这些愚蠢的空中小处男们，给窝围过来！所有楞，听着！就像老子经常说的那样，胜利与底线无关，嗯，跟那个没关系，而是完全取决驴..."，通常这之后他就醉倒了。
Fire at your foes with a crystal pistol while protecting yourself with a shield.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile, Melee.
用魔晶手枪向敌人开火，同时用盾牌保护自己。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物，近战。

Pistol and Shield is the trademark style of the Protectors' infantry: the army of the Republic in charge of homeland security and population control. A line of Protectors handling a local riot can be a dreadful sight: the shieldwall blocks basic projectiles like paving stones, bottles and sharp sticks, and anyone getting close takes a bullet to the knee. With an order from their superior, they do not hesitate to shoot to kill.
手枪和盾牌是保护者步兵的标志，他们是共和国负责国土安全和人口控制的军队。一队保护者镇压一场本地骚乱的可能会是一副可怕的景象：盾墙挡住了一些基本的投掷物，如石砖、瓶子和削尖的棍子，任何接近的人都会被射击膝盖。在上级的命令下，他们开枪杀人毫不犹豫。
Shoot arrows at your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
向你的敌人射箭。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。
The noble arrow, the great equalizer. A lord on his high horse, a knight with a castleforged sword, or a pitchfork-wielding peasant will all share the same fate once showered with arrows.
在高贵的箭矢面前，众生平等。骑着高头大马的领主，一个拿着制式宝剑的骑士，或者一个挥舞着草叉的农夫，一旦被箭雨覆盖，他们的命运没什么不同。
Tap into the staff's power to cast projectiles.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
通过挖掘法杖中的力量来施放飞弹。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。
Charging into battle? Muddy skirmishes? Gory eviscerations? These are peasant practices at best. Exterminating your foes from afar with magic is just more stylish... and more sanitary.
冲锋陷阵？ 焦灼的缠斗？ 血刺呼啦的肉搏？ 这些充其量只是农夫的做法。 用魔法从远处消灭你敌人更加优雅… 也更加卫生。
Launch a volley of arrows to the cursor’s location that deals Damage in an Area-of-Effect over time. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack.
向光标位置抛射箭雨，持续造成AOE伤害。 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Krearion, The First Bow" so that men could master the art of raining death.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"科瑞里昂，第一弓"，于是人们可以掌握死亡之雨的艺术。
Launch a dual-blade Projectile in the cursor’s direction that deals Damage to Enemies in its path. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue.
向光标方向发射一个双刃投射物，对路径上的敌人造成伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠。

Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, forged Omeagram, The First Double Bladed Sword, to push humans to their limits in terms of grace and agility. Manipulating this weapon can be as deadly for its wielder as it is for their foes.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"奥米格拉姆，第一双刃剑"，将人类优雅和敏捷的方式推到极限。对于它的使用者来说，操纵它的危险不下于它对敌人的威胁。

Launch a Projectile to the cursor’s location that explodes, dealing Damage to Enemies in an Area-of-Effect. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Device.
向光标位置发射一枚会爆炸的投射物，对AOE范围内的敌人造成伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，装置。

Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, is an inventor with a brilliant mind. Ironically he uses that technology to appeal to humans' most primal desire; their lust for power. To leverage that to his advantage, he created countless death-bringing machines and devices. The "Empyrean Mortar Mark IV" is just another one of them.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，是个有着聪明头脑的发明家。具有讽刺意味的是，他利用自己的技术让人类最原始的欲望：对权力的欲望得以通过武力实现。通过利用这一优势，他创造了无数能带来死亡的机器和设备。“天堂巨炮 IV号”只是其中之一。
Summon a hammer and bring it down in front of you, dealing Damage to Enemies in an Area-of-Effect. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
召唤一把巨锤并在你面前砸下，对敌人造成AOE伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Hephaäron, Primordial of Industry, forged "Gaavanir ,The First Hammer" to shatter bones and will alike. Only dust and despair remain in its wake.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"盖文尼尔，第一锤"，用它来击碎骨头和意志。它挥舞的轨迹之下，留下的只有肉沫和绝望。

Channel multiple shots and hover or click on Enemies to target them. Projectiles are launched at the Targets when the channeling ends or the maximum Targets are selected. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Device.
引导多次射击，通过光标悬停或点击来瞄准敌人，引导结束或选择的目标数达到上限时射出投射物。 （攻击技能） 需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，装置。
Ezaneal, the Fallen Lord of Trickery, created incredible gun-slinging techniques while developing the first pistol, the Handheld Iosonic Cannon.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，在研制“第一枪，耶索尼克手持炮”的时候创造了令人难以置信的压枪技术。

Cast a chain lightning Spell that bounces lightning between multiple Enemies, dealing decreased Lightning Damage for each subsequent Enemy it hits. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
释放一道闪电链，它的电弧会在多个敌人间弹跳，造成闪电伤害，但每次弹跳的伤害会递减。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Beelmalik, the Fallen Lord of Punishment, used to rule over the primal element of Lightning. He kept a distinct taste for chaining attacks, representative of his desire to capture and imprison his brethren Abanazaar, Lord of Envy, and Etheliel, Lady of Vanity.
比马利克，堕落的惩罚之王，曾经掌管原始的闪电元素。他对连锁攻击情有独钟，这象征着他想要俘获和囚禁他的胞亲：嫉妒之王-阿巴那扎和虚荣女神-耶特利尔的野望。
Summon a shield and charge in the cursor’s direction, dealing Damage in an Area-of-Effect when the charge hits an Enemy. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
召唤一面盾牌，向光标方向冲锋，冲锋击中一名敌人时会造成AOE伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Baäpheth, as the Primordial of Ambition, used the mighty shield Gleidhir, the First Shield, forged by Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, to charge recklessly into the heart of the battle.
野心之源，拜费特，曾经使用由制造之主赫法耶博铸造的强大盾牌“格莱提尔，第一盾”莽进战场中央。
Mark an Enemy, inflicting a number of Curse Ailment stacks on them. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
标记一个目标，施加一定层数的诅咒异常状态。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。
Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, hunts all beings that are not part of Creation's original intent. His targets are tagged, meaning they are ready for purification.
萨利塞尔，纯净之源，狩猎所有不符合造物主初衷的生物。被他标记，就意味着离被净化不远了。

Summon two daggers and dash toward a Target, hitting them and dealing Damage. When within Melee Range, the dash is omitted and the Attack triggered instantly. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
召唤两把匕首冲向一个目标，戳击并造成伤害。如果在近战范围内使用，则会省略冲刺，直接持续触发戳击。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Sazanek, The First Twinblades" by colliding two moons and transferring that power into its blade.
制造之主，赫法耶博通过碰撞双月并将产生的能量转移到它的刀刃上，从而铸造了“第一双子刃，萨扎内克”。

Summon a fireball Projectile and launch it in the cursor’s direction. The Projectile explodes when it hits an Enemy, dealing Damage in an Area-of-Effect. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
召唤一枚火球投射物，向光标方向发射，投射物击中一名敌人时会爆炸，造成AOE伤害。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。

Abanazaar, the Fallen Lord of Envy, consumes all that he covets. His cravings are bottomless, absolute and destructive. Those who know how to tap into their most insane passions will understand the fiery power that the feeling contains. Shaping it into a burning ball comes with practice.
堕落的嫉妒之主，阿巴纳扎，烧毁了他所觊觎的一切。他的渴望是永无止境的、绝对的和毁灭性的。那些知道如何开发自己最疯狂的情绪的人会了解这种感觉所包含的炽热力量。练习着把这种力量塑造成燃烧的火球吧。

Summon a mass of ice above the cursor’s location. After a delay, the mass of ice strikes the ground, dealing Damage in an Area-of-Effect Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
在光标位置上空召唤一大团寒冰。短暂延迟后，冰块砸落到地面，造成AOE伤害。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。
Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, sheds deadly frozen tears whenever she is confronted with the world's decay. Ruthless sorcerers learned to leverage her sorrow into chilling death.
耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，每当她面对这个世界的腐朽，就会落下致命的冰冷之泪。无情的巫师学会了利用她的悲伤来制造凌冽的死亡。
Summon an ice Projectile and launch it in the cursor’s direction after a delay. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
召唤一枚指向光标方向的冰锥投射物，短暂延迟之后射出。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。

Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, despises the use of ice as vulgar projectiles. The victims get impaled in atrocious ways which she cannot condone: they should be frozen instantly. Unfortunately, few sorcerers take these considerations into account.
耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，鄙视把寒冰当作粗俗的子弹。受害者被以暴力血腥的方式刺穿是她所不能饶恕的事情：他们应当被立即冻结。不幸的是，很少有巫师会考虑这些。
Cast an ice nova that Freezes Enemies in an Area-of-Effect around you. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
施放一道冰霜新星，冻结你周围AOE范围内的敌人。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, wants to cover the world in ice to preserve it. Freezing friend and foe alike to trap their beauty, forever.
耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，想要用冰雪的覆盖来保护这个世界。将所有人冰封，让美丽永远定格。
Launch a hook Projectile in the cursor’s direction, pulling Enemies that the hook hits to your location. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
向光标方向抛出钩链，将钩子击中的敌人拖拽到你的位置。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Kirenas, The First Grappling Hook" when Sarisel asked him for a tool to hunt down the evil creatures of the world.
当萨利塞尔请求赫法耶博给他提供一件追捕世间邪恶生物的工具时，这位制造之主铸造了“基勒纳斯，第一钩爪”。
Release a current of electricity through your sword and cut through your enemies. Can hold 2 charges. Attack: Only usable with this weapon. Skill Tags: Spell.
通过你的剑释放电流，切割你的敌人。能充能两次。 （攻击技能）限定当前武器。 技能标签：法术，位移。
Lightning weapons are used by veteran Purifiers to protect the world from witchcraft. The flow of electricity is controlled by a small button on the hilt of the sword.
经验丰富的净化者用闪电武器来保护世界免受巫术的侵害。电流由剑柄上的一个小按钮控制。

Launch an axe Projectile in a circle around you, dealing Damage to Enemies it hits. Base Physical damage converts into Rend damage. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
丢出一把围绕着你旋转的飞斧，对其击中的敌人造成伤害。基础物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Ashkadi, The First Axe" to demonstrate that the greatest momentum is birthed from imbalance. The will to right what is wrong and recreate a pristine harmony is a basic concept that organizes the great powers of the universe, and which is captured through the spin of Ashkadi.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“阿什卡迪，第一斧”用它来证明最大的动力是由不平衡产生的。纠正错误和重归和谐的意愿是一种组织宇宙伟力的基本概念，阿什卡迪的旋转所俘获的也正是那种力量。

Channel a beam in the cursor’s direction, dealing Aether Damage to Enemies within its Area-of-Effect. Turn Speed is determined by your Spell Casting Speed. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
朝光标方向引导一束以太射线，对其AOE范围内的敌人造成以太伤害。引导时的转向速度由施放速度决定。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Anulai-Tai, the Fallen Duke of Infinity, is not nicknamed "The Last Morrow" for no reason. channelling so much of his pure Aether energy always constitutes a danger to the fabric of time, and even moreso to those standing in front of it.
阿努莱-泰，堕落的无限公爵，他得到“最后的明天”这一绰号并不是没有原因的。大量引导他那纯粹的以太能量甚至能对时间的结构造成威胁，更别提挡在其路径上的人了。
Summon a spear and leap to the cursor’s location, damaging Enemies when you land in an Area-of-Effect. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Movement.
召唤一支长矛并跳向光标位置，落地时造成AOE伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Ishmir, The First Spear" to teach men to work together on the battlefield. True warriors, however, will use this versatile weapon with lethal efficiency.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"伊什米尔，第一矛"，以教导人们在战场上合作。真正的战士无论什么情况都能让这把万金油武器发挥出极其致命的效果。
Summon a pair of chains and deal Damage with a Melee Attack combo. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
召唤一对钩链，用近战攻击连击造成伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Baäpheth, the Fallen Archduke of War, used the chains that once bound him to wreak havoc upon the Army of Genesis.
拜费特，堕落的战争大公，曾使用束缚他的锁链重创了天启军团。
Cast an Area-of-Effect around you that regenerates Health for you and your Allies. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
在你脚下施放一个光环，它会回复你和你盟友的生命值。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
Anathëa, Lady of Dawn, can bring her light to even the darkest depths, warming the heart of those fighting the perils of the night. The Brothers of Dawn are ever thankful for her protection.
安娜蒂亚，黎明女神，她的光芒能到达最黑暗的深渊，给那些与长夜中的艰险抗争的人们带去温暖。黎明兄弟会永远感恩她的庇护。
Summon a bow and launch multiple arrow Projectiles in a spread in the cursor’s direction. The Projectiles pierce Enemies. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile.
召唤一把长弓，向光标方向散射出多支箭矢投射物。这些投射物能穿透敌人 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Krearion, The First Bow" by merging the power of a tidal wave and the accuracy of a lightning strike.
赫法耶博，制造之主，通过融合潮汐的力量和雷击的精准铸造了"科瑞里昂，第一弓"。
Teleport to the cursor’s location. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Movement.
传送到光标位置。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，位移。
Anulai-Tai, Fallen Duke of Infinity, is the master of the aether, the fabric that binds time and space. Its mastery redefines the understanding of the world, starting with the linearity of its flow.
阿努莱-泰，堕落的无限公爵，主宰着以太和约束时空的结构。掌握这项技能将重构对于世界的理解，从时空连续性开始。

Summon a turret at the cursor’s location that launches bullet Projectiles in the cursor’s direction. Chanel this Skill to hold the turret and direct its Projectiles. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Device.
在光标位置召唤一个面朝光标方向的炮台，它会持续发射子弹投射物。引导该技能可以拎起炮台，亲手为其指向。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，装置。
Ezaneal, the Fallen Lord of Trickery, invented the 'Avenger' Autoturret that fires at enemies on sight to protect his followers from raiders.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，发明了会向视野内敌人开火的“复仇者”自动炮台，用它来保护他的追随者们免受袭击。
Cast a warcry that gives you and Nearby Allies an Attack Speed and Spell Casting Speed Buff. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Warrior.
发出一声战吼，给予自己和附近的盟友一个攻击、施法速度BUFF。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：战士。
Baäpheth, Fallen Archduke of War and one of the nine shadows of the world, is the father of all warriors. Channeling his power grants the ferocity needed to survive a battle.
作为堕落战争大公和世界九影之一的拜费特乃是战士之祖。引导他的力量会获得在战场上生存所必须的勇猛。
Summon a greatsword and spin it around you, dealing Damage in an Area-of-Effect while moving in the cursor’s direction. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
召唤一柄巨剑，通过挥舞使它围绕你旋转，造成AOE伤害的同时向光标方向移动。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged Voknafein, the First Greatsword, to push himself and humanity to the limits of their strength and creativity.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“沃克纳芬，第一巨剑”，来将他自己和人类的力量与创造力推向极限。

Summon a shield that absorbs Damage, exploding when its Maximum Absorption is reached or it is Cast again. The explosion deals Damage to Enemies in an Area-of-Effect. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
召唤一组能吸收伤害的盾牌，吸收的伤害达到最大值或重新施放技能时爆炸。爆炸造成AOE伤害。 （攻击技能） 只能使用近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, is lord of the Armory of Creation. Every weapon he places within that hall spreads through the minds of men and the halls of Wolcen, and the shield Gleidhir is no exception, casting a shadow which stands hardy before those who know to call it.
赫法隆，工业大师，是创造兵工厂的主人。他在那大厅里放置的每一件武器都在人们和沃尔森大厅里传播开来，格莱德希尔的盾牌也不例外，在那些知道如何称呼它的人面前投下了一个顽强的阴影。

Charge a spell that teleports you to the cursor’s location and creates an Area-of-Effect that deals Sacred Damage to Enemies. The Damage increases at each charge level. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Movement.
蓄力一道法术，它会造成AOE神圣伤害并将你传送到光标位置。每个蓄力等级伤害都会增加。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，位移。

Anathëa, Primordial of Dawn, descended on the defeated Army of Alia's first king and gave them the Helion. She healed their wounded and weary, and taught them that mankind's strongest weapon was hope.
安娜蒂亚，黎明之源，降临在阿利亚第一任国王战败的军队面前，赐予他们氦闪。她治愈了他们的伤痛和疲倦，并教导他们人类最强大的武器是希望。
Cast an Area-of-Effect at your location that grants a Buff to your Rend Damage based on your missing Health. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
在你的位置施放一个AOE，它会授予你一个基于已损失生命值的额外撕裂伤害BUFF。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。
Baäpheth, Fallen Archduke of War, proved himself against Moros and the Army of Genesis by catalyzing the last strength of Bezeriel, Mortality Itself.
巴哈菲斯，倒下的战争大公爵，通过催化贝塞尔的最后力量证明了自己对抗摩洛斯和创世纪军队.

Launch a hammer Projectile in the direction of the cursor, dealing Damage to Enemies. The Hammer can be recalled to your location by Casting again. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Warrior.
向光标方向掷出一柄飞锤投射物，对沿途的敌人造成伤害。再次施放时飞锤会返回你的位置。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，战士。

Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, forged the first warhammer Gaavanir. When challenged on its ownership by the Primordial of Ambition, Baäpheth, he proved himself its rightful wielder when the hammer flew back to his open hand.
赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“盖文尼尔，第一战锤”。野心之源拜费特为了此锤的归属权向他发起了挑战，当战锤飞回他张开的手掌中，赫法耶博证明了自己才是它正当的持有者。

Charge a shot in the direction of the cursor. As the shot charges, its Area-of-Effect narrows, increasing its Damage. Base Physical Damage converts into Lightning Damage. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Device.
朝光标方向蓄力一发炮击，随着蓄力的进行，AOE范围会变窄，造成的伤害则会增加。基础物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，装置。

Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, challenged Hephaäron with the claim that his Bio-Optical Targeting Interface could match any of his master’s bows in a hunt. Taking the place of his First Man champion, Ezaneal demonstrated the superiority of his construct.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，宣称他的光学瞄准接口在狩猎方面可以匹敌他师父的任何弓箭，以此挑战赫法耶博。通过成为初代人类的冠军，伊查内亚也证明了他作品的优越性。
Cast a cloud at your location that makes you Invisible and decreases your Threat. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
在你的位置施放一团烟云，使你隐身并减少仇恨。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。
When Moros, Primordial of Dusk, was attacked by a jealous Abanazaar, he turned the dishonorable ambush into a pitch dark hunt between the two rivals, leveraging the forces of dusk.
当黄昏之源摩洛斯被妒火中烧的阿巴那扎袭击时，他利用黄昏的力量，把这场不光彩的伏击变成了一场针锋相对的漆黑狩猎。

Dash in the opposite direction of the cursor and launch a Projectile that Slows Enemies in an Area-of-Effect. Base Physical damage converts into Shadow damage. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Movement.
朝光标反方向冲刺并射出一枚造成AOE减速的投射物。基础物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，位移。

Moros, Primordial of Dusk, encouraged the Primordial of Brilliance, Ezaneal, to construct new and innovative weapons to protect mankind. In return, Ezaneal gave Moros black shells to slow his enemies.
暮色之源的摩洛斯鼓励光明之源以萨内尔建造新的和创新的武器来保护人类。作为回报，以萨内尔给了摩洛斯黑色的炮弹来减缓他的敌人。

Channel a ray from the sky that deals Sacred Damage in an Area-of-Effect over time. While channeling the ray, the Area-of-Effect moves in the cursor’s direction. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
引导一束从天而降的光束，它会持续造成神圣伤害。引导光束时，AOE会朝光标位置移动。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Anathëa, Primordial Lady of Dawn, was a kind guardian to all of Creation. But when Abanazaar took chase after her as an unwanted suitor, she proved to him that the sun didn’t merely warm; it scorched.
阿纳蒂亚，黎明的原始女神，是所有造物的守护者。但当阿巴那扎尔以一个不受欢迎的追求者的身份追上她时，她向他证明了太阳不仅温暖，而且炙热。

Cast an Area-of-Effect to the cursor’s location. When Enemies or Summons die within the Area-of-Effect, they explode, dealing Toxic Damage in an Area-of-Effect. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
将一个范围效果施放到光标位置，敌人或召唤物在其范围内死亡后会爆炸，造成AOE毒素伤害。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, once used the bodies of the dead to explore obscene new perspectives of violence. His cult follows in his footsteps, the process of decomposition in warfare.
贝泽里尔，堕落的末日大公，曾经用死者的尸体来探索淫秽的暴力新视角。他的邪教跟随他的脚步，在战争中分解的过程。
Cast a vortex to the cursor’s location that pulls in Enemies after a short time and deals Damage over time in an Area-of-Effect. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
将一个具有两重范围的漩涡施放到光标位置。范围较小的区域会持续造成伤害，短时间后，范围较大的区域会将敌人拉到中心。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
When Anulai-Tai, Fallen Duke of Infinity, exiled himself out of time, his exit created a vortex which drained all life around it.
当阿努莱泰，堕落的无限公爵，在流放的时间里，他在出口创造了一个漩涡，耗尽了它周围的所有生命。

Summon a zombie at the cursor’s location that hits Enemies with Melee Attacks. If Maximum Summons is reached, zombies charge in the direction of the cursor. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
在光标位置召唤一个通过近战攻击造成伤害的僵尸。如果僵尸的数量达到最大，施放技能就会让它们向光标位置冲锋。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, returns a generous boost of necrotic energy to his worshippers in exchange for sacrifices of pain, agony, and above all, plague. For this reason, his cults keep a supply of half dead hordes.
堕落的毁灭公爵贝泽瑞尔，用死灵能量慷慨地回馈他的崇拜者，作为他们献祭疼痛、苦楚尤其是灾难的交换。因此，他的教派能维持海量的活尸供应。

Summon a zombie at the cursor’s location that launches Projectiles. If Maximum Summons is reached, zombies launch Projectiles at the cursor’s location. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
在光标位置召唤一个发射投射物的僵尸。如果僵尸的数量达到最大，施放技能会让它们朝光标位置发射投射物。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, asked Anathëa for a dead sun to overlook the dead. When she refused, he corrupted her with a burst of cadaveric energy that reached from the crust of the earth to the clouds, and produced the first living dead.
倒下的末日大公贝泽里尔向安纳特请求一个枯萎的太阳来俯瞰死者。当她拒绝时，他用一股从地壳到云层的尸体能量腐蚀了她，产生了第一个活着的死人。

Summon a zombie at the cursor’s location that generates Threat and deals Toxic Damage to Enemies with Melee Attacks. Zombie generates Threat if Cast again. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
在光标位置召唤一具会生成仇恨和通过近战攻击对敌人造成毒素伤害的僵尸。再次施放技能，傀儡会发动战吼生成仇恨。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。
Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, is described as a sprawling body of rotting flesh. For this reason, his most valued worshippers modify their frames into similar shape, ever hungering for growth.
贝泽里尔，倒下的末日大公，被描述为一个腐烂的肉身蔓延。因为这个原因，他最有价值的崇拜者把他们的框架修改成类似的形状，永远渴望成长。

Channel a beam to a Target that transfers their Health to you until they become possessed. Once possessed, the Target becomes an Ally and their Health is restored. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
朝一个目标引导吸血射线直至其被你控制。目标被你控制后会变为盟友且生命立即回满。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。
Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, is worshipped through a variety of cruel strange means. One of these is The Sweet Tooth Worm gorges itself on decaying flesh and produces necrotic effects.
贝泽里尔，乃是堕落的末日大公，他的信徒用各种残忍变态的手段来表达对祂的崇拜。其中之一就是让啮食蠕虫在腐烂的血肉上自我吞噬，从而制造坏疽。
Hit Enemies within Melee range multiple times with a combo, generating Willpower per Enemy hit. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
使用一串连击在近战范围内多次攻击敌人，每次击中敌人都会获得魔力。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
Anulai-Tai, Fallen Archduke of Infinity, wove the fabric of time when called into existence by the First Movement of Creation.
阿努莱-泰乃是堕落的无限大公，他在造物启元中应运而生时编织了时间之纱。
Cast a cone of force in the cursor’s direction that Knocks Back and Stuns Enemies and destroys Projectiles. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
向光标方向施放一道锥形力量，它将击退并眩晕敌人，同时摧毁投射物。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。
Moros, Primordial of Dusk, wielded great clouds of darkness to turn the tide of battle when his forces seemed surrounded.
莫洛斯，最初的黄昏，挥舞着巨大的黑暗乌云，当他的部队似乎被包围时，扭转了战斗的潮流。
SKILLS VARIANTS <font color="#cb5316"> Rage <font color="#948ec6"> Willpower
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Enemies within this Skill's Area-of-Effect become Slowed.
该技能AOE范围内的敌人会被减速。
The Skill's Damage is dealt immediately after being Cast, but Damage is decreased.
该技能被施放后一次性造成全部伤害，但总伤害降低。
Converts base Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n给予该技能伤害加成。

Abanazaar, once Primordial of Fire, ravaged a continent pursuing his unrequited love, his envy consuming and melting everything, the ground itself turning to lava in his wake.\n\nWhile Hephaäron was his enemy, he remained a keen opportunist. He got to work, installing a forge near the melting continent and shaping its burning metals into superdense flaming arrowheads meant to feed the mouth of Krearion.
阿巴纳扎，曾是火之源，为了追求他的单恋对象曾毁灭了一片大陆，他的妒火烧熔一切，所到之处大地化作岩浆。\n\n当时赫法耶博是他的敌人，他便自力更生，在那片可怜的大陆旁安置了一座熔炉，将燃烧着的金属塑造成超高密度的燃焰箭头，用来喂进科瑞里昂的嘴巴里。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Arrows become a vertical barrage that creeps forward slowly.
箭雨变成一个缓慢向前移动的垂直弹幕。

Krearion was forged with the ability to soak up the surrounding static energy and release it as sheer force whenever unleashing volleys of arrows. The energy generated by the projectiles creates a virtuous loop that allows attacks to advance across the battlefield with minimal effort from the archer.
来自科瑞里昂能力的锻造使得每次发射箭雨时都会吸收周围的静态能量，并将之化作纯粹的力量释放出去。而由箭矢投射产生的能量又构造了一个良性循环，使得射手花费最少的努力就能让他的攻击推进，穿越战场。
This Skill's keybind can now be pressed and held to increase the Damage it deals when it is Cast.
允许在施放时长按该技能的快捷键来提高其武器伤害百分比。
Increases the Critical Chance Score for yourself and Nearby Allies when you Cast this Skill.
施放该技能时增加自身和周围盟友的暴击几率值。
Killing an Enemy decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
该技能每击杀一个敌人都会减少其冷却时间。

Scholars and logisticians have theorized that the impact of sustained fire on a specific battlefield area has heavily disminishing returns in terms of efficiency. Accuracy and restraint allow for a more strategic approach that saves a considerable amount of resources for roughly similar results.
学者和后勤学家认为，持续火力对特定战场区域的影响在效率方面严重削弱了回报。准确和克制使我们能够采取更具战略性的方法，为大致相似的结果节省大量资源
The Damage of this Skill is multiplied per Enemy within its Area-of-Effect.
技能AOE范围内每多一个敌人，技能获得+30%伤害修正。
Gives this Skill a Chance to summon an Ally that Casts two smaller Area-of-Effects around yours.
让该技能有几率召唤幽灵盟友，它会在你造成的AOE周围制造两个较小的AOE。
Increases Ailment Damage of Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Decreases the Rage Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的怒气消耗。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Decreases the time taken for this Skill to regenerate a Charge.
缩短该技能恢复一层充能的时间。
The Projectile of this Skill circles around the cursor's location.
该技能的投射物会围绕光标位置盘旋。

When Abanazaar, once Primordial of Fire, crossed an ocean to meet his unrequited love, it created a tempestuous cyclone made of scorching steam. It is said that to tame the cyclone, Hephaäron started forging Omeagram in the eye of the storm to redirect its power into the legendary blade.
阿巴纳扎，曾经的火之源，当他穿过一片大洋去见他的单恋对象时，创造出一道由灼热的蒸汽构成的狂暴飓风。据说为了驯服飓风，赫法耶博在飓风风眼中铸造奥米格拉姆，从而将飓风的力量导入这把传奇之刃。
Converts base Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\n\nAn additional Ailment stack is inflicted when inflicting the Poison Ailment with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n\n造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

While cleansing a village captured by Bezeriel’s followers, Sarisel encountered an Immortal Maw, one of the Fallen Archduke of Doom's gluttonous minions. These high-ranking cultists serve Bezeriel through mirroring his behaviour, consuming all dead flesh they encounter. The Immortal Maw swallowed Omeagram, its reinforced gullet enduring the internal damage, so Sarisel was forced to tear apart its immense, obese carcass with his bare hands. Omeagram became tainted with the necrotic poison of Bezeriel, rendering it impure, and thus Sarisel banished it to Hephaäron's Armoury of Creation.
当清理一个被贝泽瑞尔的追随者攻占的村庄时，萨利塞尔遭遇了一只不朽巨口，那是堕落的末日公爵手下的饕餮仆从之一。这些高阶邪教徒通过映射贝泽瑞尔的行为，吞噬所有遇到尸体血肉来侍奉他。这只不朽巨口吞下了奥米格拉姆，它强韧的食道能承受来自内部的伤害，因此萨利塞尔被迫徒手撕开它庞大而肥胖的尸体。贝泽瑞尔的腐败毒素污染了奥米格拉姆，使它不再纯净。因此萨利塞尔将它放逐到了赫法耶博的造物武库中。
This Skill's Maximum number of Charges is increased by 1.
The Projectile of this Skill immobilizes Enemies.
该技能的投射物会禁锢敌人。
If you Cast this Skill again while its Projectile is still active, you teleport to the location of the Projectile.
若该技能投射物存在时再次施放该技能，你会传送到投射物所在位置。
This Skill leaves an Area-of-Effect in its trail for a few seconds that deals Damage.
该技能留下一道持续几秒的AOE伤害轨迹。
The Projectile of this Skill transmits Ailments from one Enemy to another.
该技能的投射物会将异常状态层数从一个目标传播到另一个目标。

The taint carried by Omeagram after its encounter with the Immortal Maw was such that it transmitted a pestilence to all surrounding things. Hephaäron built a case for it, forged from Primordial Steel, where the blade stewed in its own fumes only gaining in toxicity.
奥米格拉姆与不朽巨口相遇后携带的污染是如此可怕，以至于它会将瘟疫传染给周围的一切。赫法耶博为了存放它，用原初钢铁铸造了一个箱子。箱子里的飞刀浸染在自身毒素的熏陶中，毒性愈加猛烈。
The Projectile of this Skill causes the first Enemy it hits to explode after a few seconds, dealing Damage in an Area-of-Effect.
投射物附着在击中的第一个敌人身上，几秒后发生爆炸，造成AOE伤害。
Converts base Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化冰霜伤害。\n\n给予该技能伤害加成。

The edges of Omeagram were keened with such precision that Hephaäron boasted its ability to cut through anything if thrown with enough might, even time and space. No volunteer dared to test the claim with their own body, thus no-one questioned the terrifying sharpness of the blades, which were as cold as his heart.
奥米格拉姆的刀刃被如此精心地打磨锋锐，以至于赫法耶博夸下海口，如果用足够强的力量掷出，奥米格拉姆能切开任何东西，甚至包括时间和空间。由于没有志愿者敢于用自己的身体检验这种说法，所以没人质疑它那如赫法耶博之心般冷冽的锋锐。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt with Ailments inflicted by this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Decreases the minimum Range of this Skill.
缩短该技能的最小发射距离。
Enemies within this Skill's Area-of-Effect become Slowed.
该技能AOE范围内的敌人会被减速。
An additional Projectile is launched by this Skill.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
该技能发射的投射物增加一枚。\n\n但会降低该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Converts Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\n\nAn additional Ailment stack is inflicted when inflicting the Bleed Ailment with this Skill.
物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n\n在造成流血时额外叠加一层。

Anything can be infused with power through faith and rituals. Explosive powder is no different. The Empyrean Mortar's ammunitions use powder steeped in viscera which is consecrated by fanatics of Ezaneal's cult in gory rituals.
任何事物都可以通过信仰和仪式注入力量。炸药也不例外。天堂巨炮的弹药使用的是浸在内脏里的粉末，而这些内脏是由伊查内亚教团的狂热成员在血腥仪式中奉献的。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
The Projectile of this Skill becomes a Mine that explodes when an Enemy is Nearby.
该技能的投射物变为地雷，如果有敌人接近就会爆炸。

Deep beneath the treacherous sands of the Laibonite desert can be found an underground laboratory used by the brightest followers of Ezaneal. These twisted cultists are experimenters that would sacrifice anything to further their research. They despise disturbances so much that they mined an absurdly large perimeter around the facility, making the whole region a deadzone in the process.
在莱邦尼特沙漠，险恶戈壁的地下深处，有一处地下实验室。它的使用者是伊查内亚最活跃的追随者们。这些心理扭曲的邪教徒是为了推进研究进度可以牺牲一切的实验者。他们是如此厌恶打扰，以至于用埋设地雷的方式让实验室周围大得夸张的一片区域成为死亡禁区。
Explosions caused by this Skill cause a cluster of smaller explosions around it.
该技能造成的每次爆炸都会在其周围制造一簇较小规模的爆炸。

The Empyrean Mortar was designed to have schematics understandable by humans. Unsatisfied with the lack of elegance that these constraints placed upon his creation, he iterated up to the Mark IV. This version requires primordial metal and uses an incredible amount of energy which lifts it up to Ezaneal's standards while making it totally unreproducible by mortals. In doing so, this unique model failed in its primary purpose: accessibility.
天堂巨炮需要有人类可以理解的设计图。由于创造受到这一约束，伊查内亚对天堂巨炮的缺乏优雅感到不满，于是他将其更新到第四代。这一版本需要原初金属，并且消耗难以想象的巨大能量，虽然达到了伊查内亚的标准，却完全无法被凡人仿造。做成这样，考虑到设计它的初衷：可用性，这种独特的原型炮已经失败了。
Launches multiple Projectiles in quick succession, but decreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.\n\nA Cooldown is added to this Skill.
可以连续快速发射多枚投射物，但会降低该技能的武器伤害倍率。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。
The Projectile of this Skill become a rocket that travels in a straight line when launched. The explosion's Area-of-Effect is decreased, but the Damage dealt with this Skill is increased.
该技能的投射物变为沿直线发射的火箭弹。减少爆炸的AOE范围但提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt with Ailments inflicted by this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
An additional Projectile is launched by this Skill.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
该技能发射的投射物增加一枚。\n\n降低该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Reduces the Rage Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的怒气消耗。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill when it hits Enemies that are Stunned.
增加该技能对眩晕敌人的暴击几率值。
Converts base Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化闪电伤害。\n\n提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。

When battlehammers were revealed to humans, mortal war became a much more tempestuous affair. The sharpening of swords gave way to the forging of maces, the rumbling thunder of a building storm. Battles became cacophonies of dull clangs as plate mail caved under the pressure of maul strikes and bones cracked sharply, a thundering hurricane littered with strikes of Lightning. Gaavanir is the embodiment of such a storm.
战锤被展示给人类之后，凡人的战争变得更加狂暴。磨砺刀剑被锻造铁锤所取代，寒光交织变作滚滚雷鸣。在锤击的压力下，钢板凹陷，骨骼粉碎，战斗被低沉的铿锵之声所主宰，宛如一场银蛇乱舞的雷鸣飓风。而盖文尼尔便是这场飓风的化身。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Allows you to charge this Skill to increase the Damage it deals.
允许你蓄力该技能来提高其武器伤害倍率。

Gaavanir slumbers in the Armory of Creation. Its very existence inspired the concept of battlehammers to craftsmen and blacksmiths around the world. Ever since, battlefields have been littered with broken skulls and crushed rib cages.
盖文尼尔被安放在造物武库中。它的存在给了全世界工匠战锤概念的启发。从那以后，战场上到处散落着破碎的头骨和断裂的肋骨。
Casting this Skill causes a chain of explosions in front of you that deal Damage.
施放该技能会在你面前形成一串造成伤害的爆炸。

Every battlehammer in Wolcen is a mere shadow of Gaavanir. The destruction they have wrought is nothing compared to what Hephaäron’s hammer would unleash upon mortal existence. In those few moments where Baäpheth tried Gaavanir, the Earth shook and brought on a chain reaction that caused every volcano to spit fire. Since then, it has slept.
Wolcen世界的每一把战锤都只是盖文尼尔的投影。它们的破坏力与赫法耶博的神锤相比不值一提。在拜费特试用盖文尼尔的那几分钟里，大地为之震动，引发的连锁反应导致全世界的火山一同喷发。从那以后，它再未被动用。
Increases the Attack Speed Score of this Skill.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
该技能获得攻击速度值加成。\n\n降低该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Gives this Skill the Chance to summon an Ally that inflicts one Hit on the Enemy hit by this Skill.
使用该技能击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵盟友，它会对被该技能击中的敌人进行一次打击。
Critical Hits inflict Stun on Enemies.\n\nA Cooldown is added to this Skill.
该技能的暴击会造成敌人眩晕。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。
Critical Hits inflicted with this Skill have a Chance to Cast a chain lightning Skill that deals Damage based on this Skill's Weapon Damage.
该技能造成的暴击有几率施放一道基于该技能武器伤害的连锁闪电。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt with Ailments inflicted by this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Reduces the Rage Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的怒气消耗。
Increases the number of Enemies that can be targeted by this Skill.
增加该技能的最大射击次数。
Each of this Skill's Projectiles that hits an Enemy deals damage in an Area-of-Effect.
该技能的每个投射物击中敌人时都会造成AOE伤害。

During his banishment to the Abyss, Ezaneal became more and more obsessed with proving his worth as an inventor. His explosive projectile design was so readily rejected by Hephaäron... What if it could be faster, more direct, more complex, more chaotic? He repeatedly swore to himself that he would overshadow his former master, render his elitist conventions obsolete and fill the world with his chaotic creations; weapons that equalize the playing field, giving anyone the chance to succeed.
在被放逐到深渊的期间，伊查内亚越来越痴迷于证明自己作为一个发明家的价值。他的爆炸投射物设计曾被赫法耶博轻率地否决...但如果它能更快，更直接，更复杂，更混乱呢？他反复向自己发誓，他总有一天要创造出令赫法耶博也黯然失色的作品，淘汰他昔日主人的那些精致古董，并让他混乱的造物充满整个世界；这些武器能让战场上不再有贵贱之分，给任何人成功的机会。
Converts base Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\n\nIncreases the Stasis Chance Score of this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n\n增加该技能造成停滞的几率值。

After much experimentation and a handful of explosive accidents, Ezaneal created the Handheld Iosonic Cannon, the First Pistol. Its pinpoint accuracy, light weight and ability to shift its traversal of aether to high speeds made it extremely deadly. Giving humanity weapons of this nature, so accessible and deadly, would no doubt cause chaos, but Hephaäron had sealed the Armory of Creation permanently. This was the only way to share his invention with humanity; it would take a genius to get inside…
经过多次试验和几次爆炸事故后，埃扎内尔发明了第一支手枪——手持式Iosonic加农炮。它的精确定位，重量轻，能够将它穿越以太的速度转换到高速，使它极其致命。给予人类这种如此容易获得和致命的武器，无疑会引起混乱，但赫帕罗恩已经永久性地密封了创造的武器库。这是与人类分享他的发明的唯一方法；要进入这个世界需要天才.…
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Each of this Skill's Projectiles that hits an Enemy increases the Damage of the next Projectile launched. This Buff is reset when a Projectile misses its Target.
神枪手标靶的射击每次击中敌人都会为下下一击提供伤害加成。一旦有一次射击没有命中，增益就会重置。

Ezaneal tracked down a Time Seal, a tool used by Anulai-Tai’s Time Devourers to pass through the Aether. Through rigorous experimentation and iteration, Ezaneal built a functional teleportation device. Activating the device tore a small rift in the Aether, allowing Ezaneal to simultaneously be inside the Armory and outside it, which threatened to separate the Fallen from his position in space and time. Despite the existential danger, Ezaneal was able to deposit his weapon into the Armory safely.
伊查内亚曾追踪一个时间之印，那是阿努莱-泰的时间吞噬者用来穿越以太的工具。通过严格的实验和迭代，伊查内亚建造了一个可用的心灵传输装置。装置激活后，在以太中撕开了一个裂隙，让伊查内亚能够同时存在于造物武库内外，这险些使他被时空割裂。尽管冒着巨大的风险，伊查内亚还是成功地将他的武器存放到造物武库中。
This Skill's Projectiles Pierce Enemies that they hit.
该技能的投射物能穿透它们击中的敌人。
Enemies with under 10% Health are automatically targeted by this Skill.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
该技能会自动瞄准生命值低于10%的目标\n\n降低该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Enemies are automatically targeted by this Skill if they are within a cone in front of you.
该技能会自动瞄准你前方的扇形范围内的敌人。
Increases the Critical Chance Score and Critical Damage of this Skill for each Ailment stack an Enemy has.
敌人身上每有一层异常状态，该技能对其的暴击几率值和暴击伤害都会提高。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill the longer you are aiming. This Buff resets after its maximum aiming time has been reached.
该技能的暴击伤害随着瞄准时间的增加而增加。该BUFF在达到最大瞄准时间后重置。
Enemies that hit you while you are aiming are automatically targeted.
瞄准过程中，击中你的敌人会被自动瞄准。

All Projectiles are now launched whenever this Skill is Cast. Projectiles that do not have a Target are launched in the direction of the cursor, but deal decreased Damage and have a decreased Critical Chance Score.
施放技能时直接射出所有投射物。没有目标的投射物会射向光标方向，但该技能的武器伤害倍率和暴击几率值都会降低。
If an Enemy is inflicted with a Critical Hit, the Critical Damage is also dealt on the first Enemy targeted by this Skill.
如果一个敌人被该技能暴击，暴击造成的额外伤害会转移给该技能瞄准的第一个敌人。
Converts base Physical Damage to a random Elemental Damage Type.
基础物理伤害转化为随机元素伤害。
Reduces the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的魔力消耗。
Decreases the amount of Damage lost when the Lightning bounces between Targets.
减少闪电在目标间弹跳时损失的伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
The Lightning now bounces between Targets an additional time.
闪电在目标间额外弹跳一次。
Converts base Lightning Damage to Shadow Damage.\n\nIncreases the Curse Chance Score of this Skill.
基础闪电伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加该技能造成诅咒的几率值。

In order to bring transgressors to justice, Beelmalik often has to search shadowy corners of the world, the domain of Moros, the Primordial of Dusk. As Beelmalik sought his redemption, the followers of Moros established a ceasefire with the Fallen Lord in their master’s absence. Criminals that threaten the weakened Cult of Shadows are removed and Beelmalik is free to deliver his righteous punishment.
为了将有罪者绳之以法，比马利克经常不得不在这方世界的阴暗角落——黄昏之源摩洛斯的领土上搜索。当比马利克寻求救赎时，摩洛斯的追随者在主人不在的情况下与堕落领主达成了停火协议。于是威胁虚弱暗影教派的罪犯遭到清除，比马利克也可以肆意实施他的正义惩罚。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。

When Cast, this Skill grants a Buff to the Damage you deal with the base Damage Type used by this Skill. The Lighting can now also bounce between Allies, and when they are Hit, they also receive the Damage Buff.
该技能会在施放时提供一个BUFF，让你和你的盟友获得类型取决于该技能基础伤害类型的额外伤害。 并且闪电链可以在盟友间跳跃，被闪电链命中的盟友也会获得该伤害BUFF。

Beelmalik used to form the same entity with Abanazaar and Etheliel. They were the Primordial of Change, ruling over the Upheaval-Tribunal. Ever since they separated, Beelmalik has been obssessed with chasing and assimilating his brethren to be whole again.
比马利克曾、阿巴纳扎、耶特利尔都曾属于同一个存在。他们是变革之源，统治着剧变法庭。自从他们分离以来，比马利克一直痴迷于追逐和同化他的胞亲们以重新成为一个整体。
There is now a Chance that Lightning will strike from the sky to Damage Targets hit by this Skill.
有几率对被该技能击中的目标发动落雷。
This Skill's Lightning prioritizes Enemies that are suffering from Effects that deal Damage-over-time.
该技能的闪电优先打击正在受到持续伤害的敌人。
The Critical Hits inflicted with this Skill now have a Chance to inflict Stun on Enemies.\n\nA Cooldown is added to this Skill.
该技能的暴击有几率造成敌人晕眩。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。
Increases this Skill's Critical Chance when it deals Damage to Shocked enemies.
增加该技能对感电敌人的暴击率。
Critical Hits inflicted with this Skill causes Lightning to strike Nearby Enemies.
该技能暴击时闪电会产生分叉打击临近目标。

As twisted and obsessive as Beelmalik can be, he still counts as a "Conciliator": a Fallen trying to repair his past deeds against Creation. Should he succeed in redeeming himself, he has the potential to embody Justice rather than Punishment. An absolute, bloody and unforgiving Justice.
扭曲顽固如比马利克，也能算作一位“调解者”：一个试图修复他过去行为的堕落者。如果他成功地救赎了自己，他就有可能体现正义而不是惩罚。一种绝对、血腥和无情的正义。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt with Ailments that are inflicted by this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the Speed of the charge.
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Enemies hit at the end of the charge are Stunned.\n\nIncreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
冲锋结束时击中的敌人会被眩晕。\n\n该技能的冷却时间增加。
This Skill's keybind can now be pressed and held to increase the duration of the charge.
允许在施放时长按该技能的快捷键来延长冲锋的持续时间。

Baäpheth commissioned Hephaäron to make something to protect himself, which manifested as Gleidhir, the First Shield. It was forged on a continent melted by Abanazaar’s rage, but it was hardened deep in the ocean by the immense pressure. Gleidhir was created to be an immovable object, to challenge Abanazaar’s unstoppable force.
拜费特委托赫法耶博制作物品来保护自己，成品即为第一盾，格莱提尔。它是在被阿巴那扎怒火融化的大陆上铸造的，又在海洋深处被巨大的压力硬化。格莱提尔被铸造成一个不可撼动的存在，用以挑战阿巴那扎不可阻挡的力量。
Converts base Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。

Armed with Gleidhir, Baäpheth steeled his resolve and charged directly at Abanazaar. Both Primordials were rushing towards each other across the ravaged land, no fear to be seen. They collided with an almighty crash, the impact sending shockwaves of debris reverberating across the plain. As the dust cleared, only one figure remained standing, shield held aloft.
装备着格莱提尔，拜费特坚定信念，直接冲向阿巴那扎。两位原初神在这片被蹂躏的土地上冲向对方，毫无畏惧。他们猛烈地相撞，撞击发出的冲击波裹挟着碎片在平原上回荡。尘埃散去，站着的只有一个，他高举着盾牌。
The charge is no longer interrupted by Crowd-Control Effects.\n\nDecreases the Damage received from Projectiles while charging.
冲锋不会被控制效果打断。\n\n冲锋时受到的投射物伤害降低。
At the end of the charge, a shock-wave is released that deals Damage to Enemies in an Area-of-Effect.
在冲锋结束时制造一个冲击波，对敌人造成AOE伤害。
While charging with this Skill, you create an Area-of-Effect on the ground beneath you that deals Damage to Enemies.
使用该技能冲锋时，会在身后的地面上留下一串对敌人造成伤害AOE。
Gives this Skill a Chance to summon an Ally that inflicts one Hit on the Enemy hit by this Skill.
使用该技能击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵盟友，它会对被该技能击中的敌人进行一次打击。
You generate Rage when this Skill hits an Enemy.
该技能击中敌人时生成怒气。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill based on your current Block Chance.
该技能获得基于你格挡率的伤害修正。
Increases your Block Chance during a charge.
冲锋时增加你的格挡几率。
While charging, this Skill grants a Buff that increases you and your Allies' All Resistances Score.
冲锋时，该技能会授予你和你的盟友一个全抗值加成BUFF。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Enemies that are hit by the charge are Stunned. Increases the Cooldown of this Skill.
冲锋击中的敌人会被眩晕。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Victorious Baäpheth approached his fallen foe. He raised his shield, and slammed it repeatedly into the face of the Primordial of Fire, flames bursting from the injured entity and turning to smoke. Under the weight of Gleidhir, all flames in the world went out, choked by Ambition and Industry’s combined forces.
得胜的拜费特接近他倒地的敌人。他举起盾牌，一次次地砸在这位原初火神的脸上，烈焰从伤痕累累的神体中涌出，而后徒劳地化作青烟。格莱提尔的重压下，世间所有的火焰在野心之神与制造之主的联手下无奈地熄灭。
The Damage received by Marked Enemies is increased further.
被标记的敌人受到的伤害进一步增加。
Enemies Marked by this Skill are now Slowed.
被该技能标记的目标会被减速。
Marked Enemies remain Marked for an increased duration.
Marked Enemies cause an explosion in an Area-of-Effect around them when they are killed. The explosion deals Damage Enemies based on the Marked Enemy's maximum Health.
敌人在不洁标记的效果下被击杀，会在周围造成基于其最大生命值的AOE伤害。

The embodiment of purity is considered to be many things depending on perspective: one of the last Primordials is a lethal purifier, or the apex of all demonhunters. He is a relentless killer of all that he deems unworthy of Creation's prime vision. Some see him as an insane being, a murdering absolute, others as one of the last reasons the Fallen haven't taken over the world and still secretly fear his name: Sarisel.
纯净的化身是怎样一种存在，有许多种观点，它们取决于不同视角：最后的原初神之一是致命的净化者，或是无上的恶魔猎手。他是个无情的杀手，击杀所有他认为不符合造物主初衷的存在。有些人把他视作疯子、杀人狂，其他人则认为他是堕落者没有占领这个世界的最后原因之一，并仍然暗自恐惧他的名字：萨利塞尔。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt to Marked enemies.
提高对被标记敌人的暴击伤害。
Increases the Chance to inflict Ailments on marked enemies.
提升对被标记敌人施加异常状态的几率。
Increases the Ailment Damage of Ailments inflicted on marked enemies.
增加对被标记敌人的异常状态伤害。
Marked Enemies spread their Mark to Nearby Enemies when they are killed.
被标记的敌人死亡时会将标记传播到周围的敌人身上。

Sarisel isn't known for his tolerance or empathy. He is a killer, a punisher, a purifier. He destroys all those that he associates with the evils of the world and the abominations they create. Once Marked by Impurity, there is no explanation, no second chance and no justice, just blind purification for all involved.
萨利塞尔并不以宽容或同情著称。他是一个杀手，一个惩罚者，一个净化者。他毁灭一切与世上的恶魔及它们的可憎造物有关的存在。一旦被标记为不洁，就没有解释，没有第二次机会，也没有正义，他就这样盲目地净化相关的一切。
Marked Enemies are inflicted with numerous Curse stacks.
被标记的敌人会被施加更多层诅咒。

Sarisel buries his weapons in the ground when they have soaked up too much blood, justifying that no thing tainted with evil in its essence could possibly do good. They remain in the ground, seeming like the bones of the world. These relics of Primordial sins have a power, emanating a curse on the towns built above. Not only do they draw the life from all things above that once thrived, but they invite hate and gratuitous violence among the people on the surface.
萨利塞尔会把吸收了太多鲜血的武器掩埋在地下，证明被邪恶玷污本质的东西就不可能保持纯洁。它们被丢在大地上，看起来就像世界的骸骨。这些原初罪恶的遗迹有一种力量，对建造在它们上面的城镇施加诅咒。它们不仅从上面曾经繁荣的一切事物中汲取生命，还在让仇恨和无端的暴力降临到生活在上方的人类中。
Marked Enemies under 10% Health are killed instantly when they are hit.
被标记的敌人生命值低于10%时被击中立即死亡。
Gives this Skill the Chance to summon an Ally that inflicts one Hit on a Marked Enemy when they are hit.
被标记的敌人被击中时有几率生成一个盟友，它会对一名被标记的敌人进行一次打击。
The Damage received by Marked Enemies is increased further.
被标记的敌人受到的伤害进一步增加。
Marked Enemies remain Marked for an increased duration.
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
The Damage received by Marked Enemies is increased further.
被标记的敌人受到的伤害进一步增加。
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Speed of this Skill's dash.
提高该技能冲刺的速度。
A portion of the Damage dealt this Skill’s Target is dealt in an Area-of-Effect around them.
该技能对目标造成的伤害会有一部分变为AOE。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
The dash now teleports you behind the Target of this Skill.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
冲刺会将你传送到该技能的目标身后。\n\n提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。

Merging two moons inside something as tiny as a blade is a dangerous endeavor even for a Primordial. Without proper mastery the resulting object could become so dense that it would crumble and become an all-devouring black hole. This intense power can manipulate time and space itself.
让双月汇于像刀刃这样微小的东西中，即使对原初神来说，也是个危险的尝试。如果驾驭不当，产生的物体密度可能会高到使它自身崩溃为为一个吞噬一切的黑洞。这种强大的力量可以操纵时间和空间。
Converts base Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\n\nIncreases the Curse Chance Score of this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加该技能造成诅咒的几率值。

Sazanek was gifted to Moros to thank him for his assistance. The Primordial of Dusk had little use for such a weapon, but carried it with him as a sign of Hephaäron’s gratitude. Over time, the blades absorbed his crepuscular energy and changed color from a gleaming silver to a deep dark blue. It was returned to the Armory of Creation before long, Moros was concerned that a weapon of such quality would never be used.
萨扎内克被赠予摩洛斯，以感激他的帮助。黄昏之源几乎用不上这样一把武器，但仍然把它带在身边，作为赫法耶博感谢的标志。随着时间的推移，这对双子刃吸收了他的黄昏能量，从闪闪发光的银色变成了深蓝色。它很快就被归还到造物武库，摩洛斯担心这样上乘的一把武器永远不会被使用。
The Damage dealt with this Skill is increased if it is Cast soon after its previous Casting.
如果技能在短时间内被再次施放，它就会获得伤害加成。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Enemies killed by this Skill transmit their Ailments to Nearby Enemies.
被此技能杀死的敌人会把身上的异常状态传播给其他敌人。
After completing a dash with this Skill, Nearby Enemies are knocked back.
该技能完成一次冲刺后，会360度击退附近的敌人。
Gives this Skill the Chance to summon an Ally that inflicts one Hit on an Enemy when they are hit by this Skill.
使用该技能击中敌人时有几率生成一个盟友，它会对一名敌人进行一次打击。
All Enemies in the path of the dash are hit in addition to the Target.
冲刺路径上的所有敌人都会被击中。
Hitting an Enemy with this Skill spawns two Projectiles that target Nearby Enemies.
该技能每次击中敌人会生成两枚投射物，它们会以附近的敌人为目标。

The two moons were hurled toward Hephaäron's forges to destroy them, a parting gift from his disciple Ezaneal. The Primordial Craftsman was out of time to save himself as well as his hard work. But Moros, the Primordial of Dusk intervened to shroud the enormous projectiles in his shadows, changing their course to collide against one another. Hephaäron seized the momentum to heat, fuse and concentrate the metal they contained into a blade that he would call Sazanek.
伊查内亚将双月被掷向赫法耶博的锻造炉来摧毁它们，作为给师父的临别赠礼。制造之主来不及拯救他自己和他的劳动成果。但是黄昏之源摩洛斯介入了，他将投来的双月遮罩在他的阴影之中，改变了它们相互碰撞的路线。赫法耶博则抓住机会，利用双月蕴含的势能将它们加热、熔化，并将所含的金属集中到这对后来被命名为萨扎内克的尖刀上。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
This Skill's Projectiles now have an increased Area-of-Effect and their Pierce Strength is increased. The Projectiles no longer explode when they hit an Enemy.
该技能投射物的AOE范围增加，并获得穿透数，但命中敌人时不再爆炸。

Jealousy goes hand in hand with envy. Abanazaar's obsessive desire to own Anathëa created in him a raging madness when he discovered her heart already belonged to Moros, Primordial of Dusk. Ever since, Abanazaar has tried to smother all the darkness and twilights of the world, illuminating them with his fiery lights, turning landscapes to smoldering pile of embers if he has to, as long as no shadows remain, eradicating all traces of his rival's legacy.
羡慕与嫉妒齐头并进。阿巴纳扎痴迷于对安娜蒂亚的占有欲，当他得知对方的心已经属于黄昏之源，摩洛斯的时候，陷入了狂暴的疯狂。从那时起，阿巴纳扎就一直试图扼杀世界上所有的黑暗和暮色，用炽热的光照耀它们，如果有必要，他会将风景化作闷烧的余烬，只要没有阴影，就消灭了他情敌遗产的所有痕迹。
An additional Projectile is launched by this Skill\n\nIncreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
该技能发射的投射物增加一枚。\n\n提高该技能的魔力消耗。
Converts base Fire Damage to Lightning Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt by this Skill.
基础火焰伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n\n提高该技能的基础伤害。

As much as Abanazaar and his cult represent a powerful and destructive force, they remain both predator and prey. Beelmalik, Fallen Lord of Punishment, aims to destroy the cult of Envy to reunite with his brother. His Entropic Judges are always on the hunt to reveal and obliterate secret organizations devoted to Abanazaar.
尽管阿巴纳扎和他的教团代表着强大的毁灭性力量，他们仍然既是猎食者也是猎物。比马利克，堕落的惩罚之王，把摧毁嫉妒的教团，与他的胞亲重新结合作为目标。他的熵之法官总是在不停地追猎，以揭露和抹杀服务于阿巴纳扎的秘密组织。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
When Cast, this Skill grants a Buff to the Damage you deal with the base Damage Type of this Skill. Allies within this Skill's Area-of-Effect also receive this Buff.
该技能会在施放时提供一个BUFF，让你获得类型取决于该技能基础伤害类型的额外伤害。被该技能的AOE波及的盟友也会获得该BUFF。

In his maddening desire for Anathëa, the Lord of Envy and his cult would abduct high ranking members of the Brotherhood of Dawn and perform unfathomable, twisted rituals on them until they become Sunslayers: dreadful fiery humans vaguely evocative of the way he sees her. In a way, by absorbing her followers into his own cult, she becomes his symbolically.
在他对安娜蒂亚的疯狂欲望中，嫉妒之王和他的教团会绑架黎明兄弟会的高阶成员，并在他们身上进行难以理解的扭曲仪式，直到他们变成太阳杀手：痛苦的火人模糊地唤起了他看到她的样子。他通过吸收她的追随者加入自己的教团，从象征意义上占有她。
An additional Projectile is launched by this Skill\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt by this Skill.
该技能发射的投射物增加一枚。\n\n降低该技能的基础伤害。
When this Skill is Cast while its Projectiles are still active, those Projectiles explode, dealing Damage with an increased Area-of-Effect.
如果在该技能的投射物存在时施放该技能，投射物会发生爆炸，造成更大范围的AOE伤害。

One of the first things that Abanazaar saw when he came to be, was the sunrise on the horizon. The moment he saw it, he knew he wanted to reach and own it. It quickly turned to passion and love for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. It finally devolved into obsessive and destructive madness when he realized that someone else owned her affections.
阿巴纳扎睁开眼看到的第一幕，便是太阳从地平线上升起。只这一眼，他就明白自己想要追求和拥有它。这很快就转化为了对黎明女神，安娜蒂亚的强烈爱意。当他意识到她钟情于他人时，这份爱最终变成了偏执和毁灭性的疯狂。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Decreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的魔力消耗。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases your Spell Casting Speed with this Skill.
提高该技能的施法速度。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.\n\nA Cooldown is added to this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。
Decreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的魔力消耗。
Decreases the delay before the mass of ice falls.
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Converts base Frost Damage to Fire Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础冰霜伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n\n提高该技能的基础伤害。

Etheliel chased Abanazaar as he rampaged through the plains, begging him to rejoin her and Beelmalik as the Primordial of Change. The constant pleading ignited his temper and Abanazaar threw a huge boulder at her for interrupting his quest for love. It flew with such rage that it caught aflame. It landed a glancing blow on Etheliel and she fled, wracked with guilt for their separation.
当阿巴纳扎狂暴地冲向平原，耶特利尔追在后面恳求他重新加入她和比马利克，成为变革之源。一遍又一遍的恳求反而引爆了他的脾气，他朝耶特利尔丢出一块巨石，因为她打扰了他对爱情的追寻。飞行中的巨石蕴含着的怒意使得它被点燃。它落地时险些擦中耶特利尔，耶特利尔疲惫地带着对当初分离的负罪感逃离了。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the delay before the mass of ice falls.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
增加冰块的落地延迟。\n\n提高该技能的基础伤害。

While no-one knows precisely where to find Etheliel, myths tell the story of a freezing wail that echoes throughout the tall mountains that link the three continents of Wolcen. A cry so mournful that it seems to lament Creation itself.
虽然没有人确切知道在哪里可以找到耶特利尔，但神话讲述了一个故事，关于回荡在连接wolcen世界三大洲的高山上的冰寒恸哭。那悲伤的哭声，似乎在哀叹造物本身。
This Skill's Area-of-Effect now deals Damage-over-time instead of instantly.
该技能的AOE从一次性造成伤害变为持续造成伤害。

Many a scar lies carved into Wolcen’s soil: the Rift dug by the conflict of Genesis, the craters blasted by Hephaäron’s creations, and the vortices created by Anulai-Tai’s comings and goings are only a few examples. But as Etheliel laments these blemishes on the beauty of Wolcen, she cannot help but make it worse, drilling into the land with disproportionately large hail as she weeps.
沃尔森的土壤上刻着许多伤疤：创世之战所挖的裂痕，赫帕罗恩创造的火山口，以及阿努莱泰来来往往所造成的漩涡，都只是少数几个例子。但是，当埃塞尔为沃尔森的美丽而惋惜这些污点时，她忍不住让它变得更糟，一边哭一边用不成比例的巨大冰雹钻入大地。
This Skill's keybind can now be pressed and held to increase the Damage dealt by the mass of ice when it falls.
允许在施放时长按该技能的快捷键来提高落体的伤害。

Etheliel was enamored of the city of Arborrel, and sought to protect it from the vagaries of time by encases it into an ice cage. The First Men inside hesitated, fearing blasphemy, but soon enough shot their arrows into the ice to free themselves. Etheliel’s love rained down on them, piercing roofs and crushing civilian and soldier without distinction.
埃塞尔对阿博雷尔城情有独钟，为了保护它不受时间变幻莫测的影响，他把它装进了一个冰笼子里。里面的第一批人害怕亵渎神明，犹豫了一下，但很快他们就把箭射入冰里释放了自己。埃塞尔的爱如雨点般落在他们身上，刺穿屋顶，毫无区别地压碎平民和士兵。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.\n\nIncreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。\n\n该技能消耗的魔力增加。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Decreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的魔力消耗。
Increases the delay before a Projectile is launched.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt by this Skill.
增加投射物的发射延迟。\n\n提高该技能的基础伤害。
Frozen Enemies killed with this Skill now have a Chance to Cast shards around them that deal Frost Damage.
击杀冻结状态下的敌人有几率在其周围爆发出冰片，造成冰霜伤害。

Etheliel is not just hateful against the usurpers of her freezing powers, she becomes absolutely frenzied when she confronts sorcerers that dare to summon her powers to tear apart the beauty of Creation. Ironically, dreadful destructive blizzards spread around her when she loses control and exacts her vengeance.
埃塞利尔不仅憎恨她冰霜力量的篡夺者，而且当她面对那些敢于召唤她的力量去撕裂造物之美的巫师时，她变得疯狂起来。具有讽刺意味的是，当她失去控制并寻求复仇时，可怕的破坏性暴风雪在她周围蔓延开来。
Converts base Frost Damage to Sacred Damage.\n\nIncreases the Weakness Chance Score of this Skill.
基础冰霜伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n\n增加该技能造成虚弱状态的几率值。

The beauty that Etheliel seeks is one of objectivity and superficiality. When she freezes beautiful individuals, they are preserved with a neutral facial expression. On the contrary, Anathëa’s beauty comes from hope, and her radiant smile made the Fallen Lady of Vanity momentarily question the legitimacy of her plight. But Etheliel was not to be convinced by such folly.
耶特利尔追求的美是客观而肤浅的美。当她冰封美丽的个体时，他们会保持着没有倾向性的面部表情。相反，安娜蒂亚的美来自希望，她灿烂的微笑使堕落的虚荣女神短暂地质疑起自己所崇尚的美丽的正统性。但耶特利尔不会被这种愚蠢的想法动摇。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Each Projectile launched by this Skill increases the Damage of the next Projectile launched incrementally. When a Projectile misses, this Damage increase is reset to the Skill's base Damage.
每有一支极地之矛击中敌人，下一支极地之矛的伤害就会提高。一旦有一支打空，此增益就会重置。
The launch of Projectiles spawned by this Skill is delayed while the Skill is being Cast. When the Skill is not being Cast, each of the Projectiles delayed launch at once.
长按技能快捷键会生成最多三枚延迟发射的投射物，所有延迟发射的投射物会在松开快捷键时一起发射。

Tricking the Fallen of Vanity into making her believe that you are a gateway for her will is a dangerous endeavour: a group of her cultists known as the Diamond Legion hunts down and captures usurpers, afflicting them with a frozen eternal torment.
欺骗虚荣心使她相信自己是通向意志的门户，这是危险的举动：她的一群信徒被称为“钻石军团”狩猎倒下并俘获篡夺者，使他们遭受冻住的永恒折磨。
Projectiles launched by this Skill will now launch smaller Projectiles around it while traveling.
投射物行进过程中会散射出较小的投射物。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Decreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.\n\nA Cooldown is added to this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the duration that Enemies remain Frozen from this Skill.
增加该技能的冻结持续时间。
This Skill can be Cast to the cursor's location.
该技能可以被施放到光标位置。

Hidden temples of Etheliel are haunting sights: their chilling halls display all types of frozen creatures that were brought there for 'immortality' by cultists. In order to curry her favor, the cultists have unholy rituals at the heart of the temple where they freeze young, beautiful prisoners as sacrifice.
耶特利尔被隐藏的神庙中是令人难以忘怀的景象：冰冷的大厅里陈列着各种各样的被冰封的生物，它们被邪教徒带到这里来获得“永生”。为了讨好她，邪教者在神庙的中心举行不洁的仪式，他们把年轻漂亮的囚犯冷冻起来作为祭品。
Converts base Frost Damage to Shadow Damage.\n\nIncreases the Curse Chance Score of this Skill.
基础冰霜伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加该技能造成诅咒的几率值。

The ice of the Lady of Vanity has lost its natural purity since she became a Fallen. Now it is filled with a lethal determination to spread over the world, a desire to fill each shadow with ice as shadow fills her heart. Through her unholy touch, Moros channels his remaining power, spreading his tainted shadow across the mortal plain.
自从虚荣女神成为堕落者，她的寒冰也失去了其与生俱来的纯净。如今它充满了要蔓延全世界的致命决意，那是要让冰霜填满每处阴影的欲望，一如填满她内心的阴影。摩洛斯引导他剩余的力量，通过耶特利尔的不洁之触，将他那被污染的阴影撒向凡间。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
This Skill's Area-of-Effect persists for a few seconds, dealing Damage to Enemies.
该技能的AOE会在地面上留下持续几秒钟的伤害区域。
When Cast, this Skill grants a Buff to the Damage you deal with the base Damage Type of this Skill. Allies within this Skill's Area-of-Effect also receive this Buff.
该技能会在施放时提供一个BUFF，让你获得类型取决于该技能基础伤害类型的额外伤害。被该技能的AOE波及的盟友也会获得该BUFF。

Etheliel knows generosity when it comes to sharing her power with mortals: she sees sorcerers and cultists as mere pawns serving her great ambition whenever they summon her cold embrace. Every time her Frost touches the world, she moves one step closer to her ultimate victory. In a way, ignorant sorcerers are just as dangerous as malignant cultists.
耶特利尔在与凡人分享力量方面十分慷慨：当巫师和邪教徒召唤她的冰冷拥抱时，她只不过将他们视作为她的野心服务的傀儡。每次她的霜冻触动世界，她都离她最终的胜利更近一步。在某种程度上，无知的巫师和邪恶的巫师一样危险。
Enemies killed while Frozen by this skill trigger another ice nova.
冻结中的敌人被此技能击杀会再触发一次冰霜新星。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。

提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。

缩短该技能的冷却时间。

提高该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the maximum Range of this Skill
增加该技能的最大距离。
Enemies hit by the hook are Stunned.
击晕被钩链命中的敌人。
You generate Rage when this Skill hits an Enemy.
该技能每击中一个敌人都会生成怒气。
You are pulled to the location of the last Enemy that the hook hits.
你会被拉到钩子击中的最后一个目标的位置。

Equipped with Kirenas, Sarisel was fighting a powerful demon lord. He used the grappling hook to pull it to him, but the demon was too strong and stood firm. The two gauged each other for a moment, holding the chain. That's when Sarisel chose to revert the mechanism of Kirenas, pulling himself towards his target. Caught off-guard, the demon lord was put down in a single blow to the head.
萨利塞尔曾带着基勒纳斯与一位强大的恶魔领主战斗。他试图用抓钩把对方拽到自己身边，但这位恶魔领主太强壮了，巍然不动。就在双方拽着链子僵持不下时，萨里塞尔当机立断，重新激活了基勒纳斯的机括，把自己拉向他的目标。恶魔领主措手不及，被一击爆头，当场毙命。
Converts base Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\n\nAn additional Ailment stack is inflicted when inflicting the Bleed Ailment with this Skill.
基础物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n\n在造成流血时额外叠加一层。

Sarisel did not sharpen Kirenas - the nicks and scratches that it picked up were like war trophies to him. This decay would never destroy the hook, for it was crafted by Hephaaron, but the imperfections added a new level of lethality. The notches dug into the hook’s target, lacerating the flesh of Sarisel’s quarry.
萨利塞尔并未磨砺过基勒纳斯-它上面的刮痕对他来说就像战利品一样。这些小刮小蹭永远也不会造成抓钩的损坏，因为它是赫法耶博的作品。但这些瑕疵却让抓钩的致命程度额外提高一层，刮痕嵌入了抓钩目标的身体，撕裂萨利塞尔猎物的血肉。
Decreases the Cooldown of this Skill.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Chance that Enemies will drop Health Globes when hit with this Skill.
提高该技能击中敌人时掉落生命球的几率。
Enemies in all directions around you are pulled to your location when they are hit by the hook.
钩链会将四面八方的敌人拉向你的位置。

Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, is known for his obsessive hunts of all that he deems tainted. While he was in the possession of Kirenas, it quickly became the extension of his will, searching and reaching evil in the most obscure corners of the world.
萨利塞尔，纯净之源，因痴迷于狩猎那些他认定被污染的存在而闻名。当基勒纳斯被他所拥有，很快就变成了他意志的延伸，帮助他搜寻和够到躲在世界最阴暗角落的邪恶。
This Skill now inflicts Stasis on Enemies.
该技能会造成敌人停滞。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the maximum Range of this Skill.
增加该技能的最大距离。

增加该技能的最大距离。

提高该技能投射物的速度。
Increases the Bleed Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能造成流血的几率值。
After this Skill is Cast, the axe continues to spin for a longer duration.
该技能被施放后，血斧会持续旋转一段时间。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Ashkadi is designed to upset the natural order, which in return reacts the only way it knows: by trying to adjust itself. The energy deployed by natural laws to fix the unbalance is what fuels the spin. With sufficient expertise, the axe-thrower can keep it spinning in a way that defies gravity itself.
阿什卡迪被设计用来扰乱自然秩序，而自然秩序唯一做出回应的方式便是：试图自我调整。被自然法则调动来修复失衡的能量是推动旋转的动力。如果有足够的专业知识，掷斧者可以使它以一种不受重力影响的方式旋转。
Converts base Physical Damage to Fire Damage instead of Rend Damage.\n\nIncreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
基础物理伤害不再转化为撕裂伤害，而是转化为火焰伤害。\n\n提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。

Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, has always been Hephaäron's rival in terms of craftmanship and creativity. That rivalry led him to break into the Armory of Creation and steal Ashkadi to understand and further the design. He convinced Abanazaar, the fallen Lord of Envy, to imbue the blade with ethereal fire. Ashkadi was later recovered but the design was tainted forever.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，在工艺和创造力方面总是能与赫法耶博一较高下。而这种较量促使他闯入造物武库，偷走阿什卡迪以了解它并进一步进行设计。他说服了堕落的嫉妒之王，阿巴纳扎，让他将超凡之火灌注到斧刃之中。后来阿什卡迪被找到了，但是已被永久地污染。
Increases your Life Leech while dealing Damage with this Skill.
血斧造成的伤害获得5%吸血。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Allows the axe to remain at your current location as you move around.

Hephaäron did not only observe the trajectory of celestial bodies, he tailed one for an unreasonable amount of time, learning and mastering every aspect of its elliptic journey. Only then, did he start imagining Ashkadi's design, aiming to reproduce its graceful trajectory in a small object.
赫法耶博不仅观察天体的轨迹，而且花费了超乎想象的时间尾随一个天体，学习和掌握其椭圆旅程的方方面面。直到那时，他才开始构思阿什卡迪的设计，以期使在微小的物体上再现那优美的轨迹。
The radius of the axe's spinning circle increases over time.
飞斧旋转的半径逐渐扩大。
This Skill can be Cast to the cursor's location.
该技能可以被施放到光标位置。
Increases the Damage dealt by this Skill for every Ailment stack an Enemy has.
敌人身上每有一层异常状态，该技能对其造成的伤害获得一定的总修正。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments inflicted with this Skill.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Decreases the Rage Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的怒气消耗。
Decreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
降低该技能的魔力消耗。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
提高该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the width of the beam.
The beam is able to Pierce Enemies.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
光束能穿透敌人。\n\n降低该技能的基础伤害。

In his madness, Anulai-Tai feels all the movements in the world and their destructive nature, like a fuzzy haze of blasphemy toward Creation. His gaze punctures through that haze, piercing space and flesh, seeking for targets to single out and lay to rest.
在疯狂中，阿努莱-泰感受到了世界上所有的运动和它们的破坏本质，仿佛看到了一片亵渎造物的朦胧阴霾。他的目光穿透了那片阴霾，刺穿了空间和血肉，寻找着需要剔除的目标。
Converts base Aether Damage to Toxic Damage.\n\nAn additional Ailment stack is inflicted when inflicting the Poison Ailment with this Skill.
基础以太伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n\n在造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

Unlike Anulai-Tai, Bezeriel is not unnerved by the passage of time. The Fallen Archduke of Doom is only conscious of his hunger. Everything around him; his cultists, the other Abbathus, even the decomposing flesh he consumes, suffers over time, but not him. He thrives off of the decay, a scavenger of life and a timeless acquaintance of the Fallen Duke of Infinity.
与阿努莱-泰不同的是，贝泽瑞尔并不会因为时间的流逝而感到恐慌。这位堕落的毁灭大公只在意他的饥饿。他周围的一切；他的崇拜者，其余阿巴图斯领主，甚至他吞食的腐烂血肉，无不受到时间的侵蚀；而他除外。他从腐坏中茁壮成长，是生命的清道夫，是堕落的无限公爵永恒的朋友。
Increases your turn speed while the beam is being Cast.
提高引导光束时的转向速度。
Increases the Damage dealt with this Skill over time as it is being Cast.
伤害随引导时间逐渐提高。
This skill fires an additional beam.\n\nIncreases the Willpower Cost of this Skill.
该技能额外发射一道光束。\n\n提高该技能的魔力消耗。

The cult of Infinity is a very dangerous one, their deadliest agents known as "Time Devourers", have specialized into isolating a foe from its normal bond to time, before discharging a tremendous amount of Aether unto the target. It accelerates its biorhythm so much that a mortal will grow old and die by the end of the channeling.
无限邪教极其危险，他们的最致命的特工被称为“时间吞食者”，专攻如何将敌人与时间的正常联系隔断，而后才是朝目标释放大量的以太。由于会大大加速生物节律，以至于凡人在引导结束时衰老乃至死去。
When cast, this Skill grants a Buff to the Damage you deal with the Toxic and Aether Damage Types. Allies within the beam also receive this Buff.
该技能会在施放时提供一个BUFF，让你获得毒素额外伤害和以太额外伤害。被该技能的AOE波及的盟友也会获得该BUFF。
The skill fires an additional beam.\n\nDecreases the Damage dealt with this Skill.
技能额外发射一道光束。\n\n降低该技能的基础伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of this Skill.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。

增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。

Increases the Critical Damage dealt with this Skill.
